description: This course studies and analyzes the concepts, principles and techniques of doing visual designs for stage performances, focusing on scenery and costumes. Students will complete design projects, drawings, renderings and scenic models. Course fee required. Prerequisite: Theatre 150 or 250. Theatre 253 Theatre Practicum in computer-aided design and drawing (CAD) recommended. Offered Fall Semester.
name: Design for Theatre
prerequisites: Theatre 150 or 250. Theatre 253 Theatre Practicum in computer-aided design and drawing (CAD) recommended. Offered Fall Semester.
